questions.name: jrsfzx
questions.title: 今日是否在校？(Are you on campus today?)

questions.name: sdlh
questions.title: 近2天内是否曾经离杭？(Did you ever leave Hangzhou in past two days?)

questions.name: jqrsflj
questions.title: 近7天是否有国内高中低风险地区旅居史?( In the past 7 days, have you ever been to any low, medium or high risk areas?)

questions.name: jqrsfys
questions.title: 近7天是否有（或被告知有）与疑似、确诊人员或密切接触者的接触史? (In the past 7 days，did you contact any COVID-19 suspected or confirmed person(s) or close contacts ?)

questions.name: sfjkgk
questions.title: 现是否处于健康管理（管控）期? 如是，请暂缓来校。(Are you under health management period currently ? If yes, please do not come to school for the time being.)

options.title: 居家健康观察期（medical observation at home）
日常健康监测期（daily health monitoring）

questions.name: xstzk
questions.title: 现身体状况，是否存在发热体温、寒战、咳嗽、胸闷以及呼吸困难等症状? (Do you have any symptoms such as fever, chills, cough, chest tightness and dyspnea?)

questions.name: jssfjcs10
questions.title: 同住家属（人员）是否有上述与疫情相关的情况？(Did your family members(s) living together have any situation mentioned above ?)

questions.name: jzym
questions.title: 当前疫苗接种情况? (Vaccination status?)

options.title: 已接种第一针 (first jab received)
已接种第二针（已满6个月）(second jab received, more than 6 months)
已接种第二针（未满6个月）(second jab received, less than 6 months)
已接种第三针( booster jab received)

questions.name: brjssfmj
questions.title: 本人或家庭成员(包括其他亲密接触人员)是否有近10日入境或未来7天内拟入境的情况? (Have you or your family members(including other close contact persons) entered China over the past 10 days or plan to enter China in 7 days?)
